name: Feditor
description:
A small indie game developed in a month during holidays, Feditor was created by a single student as a portfolio piece. Insipred by Fedmyster, a Twitch and Youtube content creator, this simple game throws tasks in the way to simulate his early streaming career in a crazy and hectic way.

  • Complete editing tasks to finish your work and be able to order food.
  • Stream to your dedicated viewers and watch as they react to your successes and failures.
  • Match the correct emote to the ones displayed on your monitor to maintain your streaming reputation.
  • Never forget to keep your energy up by eating and not spending too long burning the last of your stamina working away.
